sql
SELECT DISTINCT T3.element FROM bond AS T1 INNER JOIN connected AS T2 ON T1.bond_id = T2.bond_id INNER JOIN atom AS T3 ON T2.atom_id = T3.atom_id WHERE T1.bond_id = 'TR001_10_11' UNION SELECT DISTINCT T4.element FROM bond AS T1 INNER JOIN connected AS T2 ON T1.bond_id = T2.bond_id INNER JOIN atom AS T4 ON T2.atom_id2 = T4.atom_id WHERE T1.bond_id = 'TR001_10_11'

SELECT CAST(SUM(CASE WHEN bond_type = '-' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS REAL) * 100 / COUNT(bond_id) AS percentage FROM bond	----- bird -----	toxicology

3:
sql
SELECT (SUM(CASE WHEN T1.event_name = 'Yearly Kickoff' THEN T3.cost ELSE 0 END) * 100.0) / SUM(T3.cost) FROM event AS T1 INNER JOIN budget AS T2 ON T1.event_id = T2.link_to_event INNER JOIN expense AS T3 ON T2.budget_id = T3.link_to_budget	----- bird -----	student_club
4:
sql
SELECT T1.event_name, T1.event_date FROM event AS T1 INNER JOIN budget AS T2 ON T1.event_id = T2.link_to_event INNER JOIN expense AS T3 ON T2.budget_id = T3.link_to_budget WHERE T3.expense_description = 'Pizza' AND T3.cost > 50 AND T3.cost < 100	----- bird -----	student_club
